items.summary: Fix all dropdown-style overlay surfaces (DropdownMenu, Select, Popover, ContextMenu, Tooltip) so the opened panel is never transparent/see-through and the menu text is readable in both light and dark themes.

Resolve the theme-token mismatch causing overlay backgrounds to render incorrectly by aligning the global CSS color variables with the format expected by Shadcn/Radix Tailwind utilities (so classes like bg-popover produce correct, opaque backgrounds).

Do a quick UI pass on the dropdown-related interactions and fix any obvious issues discovered during the audit (e.g., overlay z-index/stacking so menus appear above sticky headers, consistent padding/radius, and no clipping on small screens).
